content.description: Sit start with your choice of bump or edge. From there, reach a left hand edge, bump through a right hand pinch to a sidepull crimp, then move to a left hand incut edge, follow to the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the center of Fortalice's east face.

content.description: Sit start with a pair of edges. From there, pull up to featured arc, follow it up and left to its natural end, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or two. The landing is very good with the exception of one rock that sits under the end of the problem.
content.location: It climbs the north section of Fortalice's east face.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand sidepull and a right hand bump. From there, bump the right hand to a pinch, then stick the first shelf with a left hand, match, move up to the next pair of shelves then the lip, and mantel on top.
content.protection: At least a few pads. The landing has a bad rock right in the middle of it.
content.location: It climbs the south section of Fortalice's east face.

content.description: Stand start with a left hand sidepull on the arete and a thin edge on the face. From there, step up and snatch the first small hueco, bring up the feet, climb through the remaining huecos to the featured lip, and top it out.
content.protection: A pad will work. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the east section of Fortalice's north face.

content.description: Sit start on the east side of the arete with a pair of edges. From there, pull up to a left hand sidepull on the arete, then reach and match hands on the sloping-pinch-edge above, continue to a left hand bump, gain the sloping right hand pinch on the arete, then stand up tall to the lip (can be difficult with the protruding rock near the waist), and mantel on top.
content.protection: A pair of pads will work well. The landing at the sit start is a bit rocky, but the remainder of the problem climbs over a flat, clear landing.
content.location: It climbs the southeast arete of Fortalice.
